post.text: I truly believe that we as Americans can accomplish ANYTHING -- and I promise you, if I'm elected, we will once again experience the American Dream! Let's close the history books on the failures in Washington, and let's open a new chapter of success and prosperity for ALL of our people!

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: What a great speech. His voice is getting raspy, bless him, don't doubt it with as much as he has talked in the last many many months. Go trump!!! Take care of yourself so you can take care of us!

replies.author: Ryley
replies.text: You brought tears to my eyes!

replies.author: Morgan
replies.text: Ryley Thank you Ryley, I didn't mean to make you cry but that speech moved me like none other that I have seen of his for some reason. Praying together that God graces us with his mercy to make this man our leader! God bless you and God bless America.

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Please help DJT like he is helping us. Please sign then share this petition if you agree. We need signatures.https://www.change.org/p/u-s-senate-remove-hillary-clinton-from-the-ballot-and-make-her-stand-trial-by-jury-for-her-crimes

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: I know it makes me cry too. He is fighting like no one before. After all the lies and negative attacks he is still standing and campaigning intensely. He's looking tired, oh God bless him ‚ù§Ô∏èüá∫üá∏

replies.author: Kate
replies.text: Yeah its all the BS coming out of his pie hole
